title: Christ Raising the Son of the Widow of Nain
provenance_text:
Thomas Butts; Thomas Butts jun., offered Foster's 29 June 1853 (lot 132) bt. in Thomas and Foster 8 March 1854 (in lot 16) bt. in; Capt. F. J. Buttsw, sold Sotheby's 24 June 1903 (lot 12) bt. (?in) Howard; Carfax 1904; F.P. Osmaston, sold Sotheby's 26-8 July 1926, 3rd day (lot 763) bt. Gabriel Wells; ?Rosenbach's; A. Edward Newton by 1939, sold Parke-Bernet 16-18 April 1941, 1st day (lot115) bt. Sessler's for Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), until April 1, 1973; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974 [1].

Notes:
[1]. Provenance from Martin Butlin, the Paintings and Drawings of William Blake (1981) no. 483 (LWL September 2014)

Under review by CGK.
